column3: Local bar.. Always friendly! On occasions have free food! Some nights entertainment!A nice local bar to visit and hangout!!!

If you like back east dive bars, you must go here! People are great and the food is excellent. Nessled in a strip mall in Santa Clarita, one might think they are in a Wisconsin neighborhood bar. Everyone is friendly and the prices are as those we are used to in the Midwest. I recommend this place as a beer stop to anyone.
